summary: No blog post this week :) I have spent some time instead sorting out [url redirects and rewrites]( https://learn.iis.net/page.aspx/665/url-rewrite-module-20-configuration-reference/) so I can have: - A canonical domain name [benmcevoy.com.au](http://benmcevoy.com.au) - Multiple domains running on my hosting Using the url module was quite awful.
keywords: , spent, time, blog, post, new, running, domain, trying
title: Metro GOOD, url rewriting BAD
